ctl:test.name: wfs:run-GetFeature-GET
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Run test group for GetFeature requests using the GET method. Target endpoint is {$wfs.GetCapabilities.document//ows:OperationsMetadata/ows:Operation[@name='GetFeature']/ows:DCP/ows:HTTP/ows:Get/@xlink:href}.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc8.1
test.assertion: A KVP parameter value that denotes a bounding box shall conform to the general syntax specified in subclause 10.2.3. If no CRS reference is provided, a service-defined default value must be assumed.
test.comment: GetFeature with BBOX KVP parameter (with the CRS specified). Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an wfs:FeatureCollection document; (3) more than one feature is in the response.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc8.2
test.assertion: A KVP parameter value that denotes a bounding box shall conform to the general syntax specified in subclause 10.2.3. If no CRS reference is provided, a service-defined default value must be assumed.
test.comment: GetFeature with BBOX KVP parameter (without the CRS specified, service default is expected). Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an wfs:FeatureCollection document; (3) more than one feature is in the response.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc8.3
test.assertion: A KVP parameter value that denotes a bounding box shall conform to the general syntax specified in subclause 10.2.3. If no CRS reference is provided, a service-defined default value must be assumed.
test.comment: GetFeature with BBOX KVP parameter (with the CRS not specified, service default expected). The BBOX values would indicate no features in the response. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an wfs:FeatureCollection document; (3) no features are in the response.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc10.1
test.assertion: A valid namespace binding expressed by the namespace parameter in a KVP string shall conform to the syntax specified in subclause 14.4.
test.comment: GetFeature with the namespace KVP parameter (escaped by engine). Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an wfs:FeatureCollection document.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc23.1
test.assertion: The following query parameters are required for all KVP-encoded service requests except GetCapabilities: service, request, version.
test.comment: GetFeature with a service='WFS', EMPTY version parameter, and request='GetFeature'. Pass if an exception report is returned.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAILURE: ows:Exception/@locator is absent or does not identify the missing version parameter value.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc23.2
test.assertion: The following query parameters are required for all KVP-encoded service requests except GetCapabilities: service, request, version.
test.comment: GetFeature with a service 'WFS', version '1.1.0', and no request parameter. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an ows:ExceptionReport document.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAILURE: ows:Exception/@locator is absent or does not identify the missing request attribute.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc23.3
test.assertion: The following query parameters are required for all KVP-encoded service requests except GetCapabilities: service, request, version.
test.comment: GetFeature with a version '1.1.0', request 'GetFeature' and no service. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an ows:ExceptionReport document.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAILURE: ows:Exception/@locator is absent or does not identify the missing service attribute.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc23.4
test.assertion: The following query parameters are required for all KVP-encoded service requests except GetCapabilities: service, request, version.
test.comment: GetFeature with a service 'WFS', request 'GetFeature' and no version. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an ows:ExceptionReport document.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc26.1
test.assertion: A comma (',') shall be used to delimit list items within multi-valued parameters in KVP strings.
test.comment: GetFeature with a typename parameter of multiple values, sperated by a comma. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an wfs:FeatureCollection document; (3) there is at least one of each of the requested feature types in the response.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc30.1
test.assertion: XPath 1.0 shall be used to address parts of an XML representation using ogc:PropertyName. Support for the AbbreviatedRelativeLocationPath construct is required; the position() function may appear in a predicate to refer to a child node by position relative to the context node.
test.comment: GetFeature with a filter using the abbreviated local path predicate on the gml:description. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an wfs:FeatureCollection document; (3) the requested feature is in the response as expected.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc30.2
test.assertion: XPath 1.0 shall be used to address parts of an XML representation using ogc:PropertyName. Support for the AbbreviatedRelativeLocationPath construct is required; the position() function may appear in a predicate to refer to a child node by position relative to the context node.
test.comment: GetFeature with a filter using the simplified position predicate ('[n]'). Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an wfs:FeatureCollection document; (3) the requested feature is in the response as expected.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc31.1
test.assertion: A valid filter expression must conform to the content model declared for the ogc:Filter element.
test.comment: GetFeature with a correctly structured filter element. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an wfs:FeatureCollection document.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc32.1
test.assertion: An ogc:Literal element may include simple or complex content. If a child element appears it may belong to any target namespace, but a top-level declaration for the item must be available.
test.comment: GetFeature with a string-valued literal in the filter. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an wfs:FeatureCollection document; (3) the requested feature shall be in the response.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc44.1
test.assertion: Version number specified in a given request must correspond to a version supported by the service.
test.comment: GetFeature with missing version parameter. Pass if the response includes an exception report.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAILURE: ows:Exception/@locator is absent or does not identify the missing version parameter value.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc44.2
test.assertion: Version number specified in a given request must correspond to a version supported by the service.
test.comment: GetFeature with a bogus version of '2006-11-14'. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an ows:ExceptionReport document.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAILURE: ows:Exception/@locator is absent or does not identify the invalid version parameter value.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc46.1
test.assertion: KVP URI encoding must be properly escaped for escape and special characters.
test.comment: GetFeature by featureType a feature using escaped characters (é = %C3%A9 in URI encoding). Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an wfs:FeatureCollection document; (3) the response must have at least the expected features (correct feature type).

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc47.1
test.assertion: IIf a request is unrecognizable or the service cannot process the request, a valid exception report must be returned.
test.comment: GetFeature with an incorrect typename ('sf:Asdf') in the query. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an ows:ServiceException document.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc47.2
test.assertion: IIf a request is unrecognizable or the service cannot process the request, a valid exception report must be returned.
test.comment: GetFeature with an incorrect propertyname ('sf:asdfProperty') requested in the query. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an ows:ServiceException document.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc48.1
test.assertion: Correctly select the objects specified by the list of supplied identifiers. The identification scheme is service-specific, but valid identifiers must substitute for ogc:_Id.
test.comment: GetFeature to first get more than one feature id (gml:id), then another GetFeature filtering on the gml:ids. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an wfs:FeatureCollection document; (3) the response shall have at least the two feature members expected from the request.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Expected valid wfs:FeatureCollection.
FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc50.1
test.assertion: When the SortBy parameter is used the resulting feature set must be properly sorted according to the sort criteria.
test.comment: GetFeature for all PrimitiveGeoFeature sorting by the intProperty in ascending order (default if no 'A' or 'D' present). Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an wfs:FeatureCollection document; (3) the response shall have the features sorted by the proper feature property in the described ascending or descending manner.

xsl:when.ctl:message: [FAILURE] Expected wfs:FeatureCollection in response.

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAILURE: Features are not sorted by sf:intProperty in ascending order.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc50.2
test.assertion: When the SortBy parameter is used the resulting feature set must be properly sorted according to the sort criteria.
test.comment: GetFeature for all PrimitiveGeoFeature sorting by the intProperty in descending order. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an wfs:FeatureCollection document; (3) the response shall have the features sorted by the proper feature property in the described ascending or descending manner.

xsl:when.ctl:message: [FAILURE] Expected wfs:FeatureCollection in response.

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAILURE: Features are not sorted by sf:intProperty in descending order.

ctl:test.name: wfs:GetFeature-output-format-default
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: The MIME returned for a GetFeature request where no specific output format is requested is "text/xml; subtype=gml/3.1.1".

ctl:test.name: wfs:GetFeature-output-format-GML2
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: When output format GML2 is supported, the MIME returned for a GetFeature request where the output format requested is GML2 is "text/xml; subtype=gml/2.1.2".

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: output format GML2 is not supported

ctl:test.name: wfs:GetFeature-output-format-gml-2.1.2
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: When output format "text/xml; subtype=gml/2.1.2" is supported, the MIME returned for a GetFeature request where the output format requested is "text/xml; subtype=gml/2.1.2" is "text/xml; subtype=gml/2.1.2".

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: output format "text/xml; subtype=gml/2.1.2" is not supported

ctl:test.name: wfs:GetFeature-extra-param
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: A valid HTTP Get request with an extra parameter not recognized by the WFS does not return an exception.

ctl:test.name: wfs:GetFeature-result-type-results
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: A GetFeature request with resultType=Results returns the actual features, not just the count of number of hits.
